Rainy_Day_0: The rain has ruined my plans to test my new model today.$7#$e#That's all right, though. Maybe I'll build a new model today!$3
Rainy_Day_1: Rainy days are good for reading.$3
Rainy_Day_2: The model company mixed up my order again. Maybe you can use this?[787 539 171 926 122 645]
Rainy_Day_3: I got a new book yesterday!$3#$e#Perfect for a rainy day like today.
Rainy_Day_4: Maybe I'll make dinner tonight. What would you like?
Rainy_Night_0: Did you stay dry today?#$e#Me? I didn't go out.
patio_SilasFS: I never had an outdoor spot of my own. This is wonderful!$3
Rainy_Night_1: The sound of the rain makes it so easy to fall asleep.#$e#Or maybe it's just that Isla and Makena aren't bickering in the next room.
Rainy_Night_2: I love the sound of the rain on the roof.
Rainy_Night_3: What did you do today?#$e#I read a book while listening to the rain.#$e#It was a good day.
Rainy_Night_4: I made my favorite meal tonight, but I saved some for you. Here you go!.[327]
Indoor_Day_0: Do you have big plans for your day?#$e#I might take one of my models out to the pond.
Indoor_Day_1: I got some extra things in my order today. Maybe you can use this?[787 539 171 926 122 645]
Indoor_Day_2: I hope my model parts come today.#$e#Online ordering has come a long way, but it still isn't perfect.#$e#I wonder if I could start a company that would be able to deliver anything you wanted...
Indoor_Day_3: I wonder what my brother is doing today.
Indoor_Day_4: I hope the twins are getting along.#$e#Maybe I'll take Makena a book next time I visit.
Indoor_Night_0: I made my favorite meal tonight, but I saved some for you. Enjoy!.[327]
Indoor_Night_1: Long day? Why don't you relax and I'll read aloud to you.
Indoor_Night_2: Want to curl up in bed and read together?#$e#We can read different books, if you want.
Indoor_Night_4: Maybe we should go to bed early tonight.#$e#Or I can read for awhile if you aren't ready to go to bed yet.
Outdoor_0: I never enjoyed spending time outside before.#$e#It's just so beautiful here.
Outdoor_1: It's good to get some fresh air.#$e#That's what my mom always said, anyway.$4
Outdoor_2: I'll just watch you from here.$3#$e#I enjoy watching you.$4
Outdoor_3: Hey! Big plans for the day?#$e#I'm just enjoying the weather.
Outdoor_4: It's so nice out today...maybe I should do something outside?#$e#Or maybe I'll just go in and read a book.
OneKid_0: I think I'm going to read to %kid1 today.#$e#I hope %kid1 grows up to love books as much as I do.
OneKid_1: I'm glad we didn't have twins, but I would like %kid1 to have a sibling some day.
OneKid_3: Do you want to have another child someday?#$e#I'd like %kid1 to know the joy of having a sibling.#$e#Maybe not the annoyance of having three, though.$2
TwoKids_0: I'm going to read to the kids today. %kid2 really enjoys looking at the pictures.
TwoKids_1: %kid1 asked me for a book yesterday. Do you think we should get a bookshelf for the kids?
TwoKids_2: I wish I could take the kids to the library.#$e#%kid1 has read all of our children's books. And %kid2 isn't far behind!
TwoKids_3: I think we've made the perfect sized family.#$e#I love living with you and %kid1 and %kid2.
Good_0: Don't worry about me. I'm going to spend the day reading.#$e#Reading is my favorite way to spend the day!$3
Good_1: You look nice today.#$e#And every day, really.
Good_2: I don't tell you enough, but I'm happy to be your husband.$3
Good_3: Marrying you was the best decision I ever made.$4#$e#I love you...$2
Good_4: I appreciate everything you do.#$e#I probably don't tell you that enough.
Good_6: I never thought I would live on a farm, but I love it!$3
funLeave_SilasFS: I think I'll visit my family today.
funReturn_SilasFS: I had a good time today, even if I didn't get to see everyone.
fall_SilasFS: Will you grow some cranberries for me this year?$3#$e#I don't know if they are profitable, but they are my favorite!$4
spouseRoom_SilasFS: This room isn't as big as the one I had at my parent's house.$2#$e#But there's still plenty of room for all my things!$3
